title: Tech Stuff example
excerpt:
Because if you put some code in your blog, you would at least make it:


  Searchable
  Good-looking


Search on code

Search should be working even for complicated escape symbols.

sed -i 's/\"hostname\"\:.*$/\"hostname\"\: \"'$IPADDR'\"\,/g' ope...
